speaker: Santos Belay
title: Designer Drag and Drop ML
description:
This video talks about Azure Machine Learning designer that will help citizen data scientists who were using the Studio (classic) and professional data scientists who are currently using Azure ML SDK to build end to end machine learning pipelines.
